${modID}:Rations.NAME: Ration
${modID}:Rations.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Tasteless, but nutritious and filling; These are perfect emergency rations.

${modID}:Gore.NAME: Gore
${modID}:Gore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sweet, sweet flesh! You were going mad surviving off crackers and cheese.

${modID}:MissingPerson.NAME: Missing Person
${modID}:MissingPerson.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card.
${modID}:MissingPerson.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card.

${modID}:Casanova.NAME: Casanova
${modID}:Casanova.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL When ${modID}:Devoured: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Casanova.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL When ${modID}:Devoured: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cleave.NAME: Cleave
${modID}:Cleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Fatal: Gain [E] .
${modID}:Cleave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Fatal: Gain [E] .

${modID}:FleshyWine.NAME: Fleshy Wine
${modID}:FleshyWine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're ${modID}:Ravenous, do it again.
${modID}:FleshyWine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're ${modID}:Ravenous, do it again.

${modID}:Cravings.NAME: Cravings
${modID}:Cravings.DESCRIPTION: Increase the cap of *X-Cost cards by !M!.
${modID}:Cravings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase the cap of *X-Cost cards by !M!.

${modID}:ProudVintner.NAME: Proud Vintner
${modID}:ProudVintner.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add !M! *Pride{!M!|>1,<1=s} to your hand. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1,<1=s}.
${modID}:ProudVintner.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add !M! *Pride{!M!|>1,<1=s} to your hand. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1,<1=s}.

${modID}:ComplexFlavor.NAME: Complex Flavor
${modID}:ComplexFlavor.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Randomly discard a card. NL Randomly Exhaust a card.
${modID}:ComplexFlavor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Randomly discard a card. NL Randomly Exhaust a card.

${modID}:Impatience.NAME: Impatience
${modID}:Impatience.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X damage. NL Exhaust the top X cards of your draw pile.
${modID}:Impatience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X damage. NL Exhaust the top X cards of the draw pile.

${modID}:Fasting.NAME: Fasting
${modID}:Fasting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Dazed into the draw pile.
${modID}:Fasting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Dazed into the draw pile.

${modID}:WineTasting.NAME: Wine Tasting
${modID}:WineTasting.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Exhaust cards instead of discarding them.
${modID}:WineTasting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Exhaust cards instead of discarding them.

${modID}:ServingTray.NAME: Serving Tray
${modID}:ServingTray.DESCRIPTION: {@@} Gain !B! Block. NL When Exhausted: Gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]} .{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}
${modID}:ServingTray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@} Gain !B! Block. NL When Exhausted: Gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]} .{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}

${modID}:Shuck.NAME: Shuck
${modID}:Shuck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Purge.
${modID}:Shuck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Purge.

${modID}:HungerPangs.NAME: Hunger Pangs
${modID}:HungerPangs.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of the turn add !M! *Ration{!M!|>1,<1=s} to your hand.
${modID}:HungerPangs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of the turn add !M! *Ration{!M!|>1,<1=s} to your hand.

${modID}:WickedWiles.NAME: Wicked Wiles
${modID}:WickedWiles.DESCRIPTION: Apply Weak to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Purge.
${modID}:WickedWiles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply Weak to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Bruteforce.NAME: Bruteforce
${modID}:Bruteforce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous.
${modID}:Bruteforce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous.

${modID}:Unsuspected.NAME: Unsuspected
${modID}:Unsuspected.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain more Block equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous.
${modID}:Unsuspected.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain more Block equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous.

${modID}:PickyEater.NAME: Picky Eater
${modID}:PickyEater.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Devour a card in your *Exhaust pile.
${modID}:PickyEater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Devour a card in your *Exhaust pile.

${modID}:HideTheEvidence.NAME: Hide the Evidence
${modID}:HideTheEvidence.DESCRIPTION: Lose HP equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous, then remove it. NL Purge.
${modID}:HideTheEvidence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose HP equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous, then remove it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CannedFood.NAME: Canned Food
${modID}:CannedFood.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The next time you gain ${modID}:Ravenous, immediately gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]} .
${modID}:CannedFood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}The next time you gain ${modID}:Ravenous, immediately gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]} .

${modID}:Consume.NAME: Consume
${modID}:Consume.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous. NL Fatal: Heal !M! HP. NL Purge.
${modID}:Consume.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous. NL Fatal: Heal !M! HP. NL Purge.

${modID}:Savagery.NAME: Savagery
${modID}:Savagery.DESCRIPTION: *Exhaust your hand. NL Deal X damage for each card exhausted.
${modID}:Savagery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Exhaust your hand. NL Deal X damage for each card exhausted.

${modID}:SetTheTable.NAME: Set the Table
${modID}:SetTheTable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous. NL Fatal: *Heal for !M! HP. NL Purge.

${modID}:BrazenMonster.NAME: Brazen Monster
${modID}:BrazenMonster.DESCRIPTION: You can draw at maximum ${modID}:Risk. When you do, lose !M! HP. and gain !M! ${modID}:Ravenous.
${modID}:BrazenMonster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You can draw at maximum ${modID}:Risk. When you do, lose !M! HP. and gain !M! ${modID}:Ravenous.
